Overview

Actions by Email is a feature available in the EasyFlow Enterprise Edition. This allows users to build interactive emails which enables the recipient to complete tasks within a worklfow and can move tasks on to the next task in the workflow by clicking on an accept or reject button in the email.

It comprises two options:

  • A form to fill in and complete which will move the case to the next task on successful validation.
  • A group of buttons where the user can approve or reject the information sent via email. It routes the case onto the next task depending on the link that the user clicked in the email.
